name: getSecrets
description: Retrieves the active Vercel secrets for the authenticated user. By default it returns 20 secrets. The rest can be retrieved using the pagination options. The body will contain an entry for each secret.

id.description: Filter out secrets based on comma separated secret ids.

projectId.description: Filter out secrets that belong to a project.

teamId.description: The Team identifier or slug to perform the request on behalf of.

$ul: **pagination**: This object contains information related to the pagination of the current request, including the necessary parameters to get the next or previous page of data.
**count**: Amount of items in the current page.
**next**: Timestamp that must be used to request the next page.
**prev**: Timestamp that must be used to request the previous page.
